text: The Men's 1500 metre freestyle competition of the 2018 African Swimming Championships was held on 14 September 2018. ==Records== Prior to the competition, the existing world and championship records were as follows. {| class=wikitable style=text-align:center |- ! !! Name !! Nation !! Time !! Location !! Date |- |World record||align=left|Sun Yang||align=left|||align=left|14:31.02||London||4 August 2012 |- |African record||align=left|Oussama Mellouli||align=left|||align=left|14:37.28||Rome||2 August 2009 |- |Championship record||align=left|Troyden Prinsloo||align=left|||align=left|15:29.93||Casablanca||7 May 2004 |} The following new records were set during this competition. {| class="wikitable" style=text-align:center |- ! Date !! Event !! Name !! Nationality !! Time !! title: 2018 African Swimming Championships – Men's 1500 metre freestyle
